## Germplasm Phenotype:
   - [SALK_140697]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;Increased chlorophyll fluorescence, pale green under normal growth conditions.  Photosynthetic activity is impaired, which is reflected in the decreased steady-state levels of chloroplast proteins.
